short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will block all pictures hosted on cheezburger.com, and replace it with a silly picture of a chihuahua.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Slight variation on a sample app, in which everything hosted on cheezburger.com is replaced by a silly picture of a chihuahua I found on tumblr.
